text:
Wood Barrels Railcar

Rail wagon where oil is carried inside wood barrels

Twin Iron Tanks

Rail wagon with two iron tanks on top

CSD-502 Tank Wagon

Old style short tanker with 12 m3 of capacity

CSD-556 Tank Wagon

Old style short tanker with 15 m3 of capacity

Esso Tank Wagon

Short Esso tanker for oil transport (19 m3)

Cepsa Tank Wagon

Modern spanish oil tanker with capacity for 24 m3

VTG Tank Wagon

Modern german oil tanker with capacity for 28 m3

Esso XL Tank Wagon

Modern Esso oil tanker with capacity for 32 m3

VTG CeSa Tank Wagon

Newest Alsthom oil tanker with capacity for 35 3

Class 100 underground train

An underground train with capacity of 238 passengers per wagon, introduced in 1926.

Class 200A underground train

A 1944 underground train with capacity of 190 passengers per car.

Class 200B underground train

Underground train available in 1953 with capacity of 383 passengers total in each engine & car pair.

Class 300 underground train

1962 underground train, capable of transporting 236 passengers in each engine & car couple.

Class 400 underground train

Underground train for 386 passengers in every engine & car formation. Available from 1958 to 1973.

Class 500 underground train

A 2003 underground train with capacity for 346 passengers in engine+car formation.

Class 1000 underground train

Underground train for 236 passengers in each wagon, available since 1970.

Class 2000 underground train

Underground train for 348 passengers in each engine & car pair, introduced in 1992.

Class 3000 underground train

An underground train driving in 3-vehicle configuration with unpowered middle car. Capacity for 515 passengers in the whole unit. Introduced 1986.

Class 6000 underground train

This five-car unit, introduced in 2007, can hold 1155 passengers at once.
